name: core9000
description:
core9000 is a game for two players. Protect your core against enemy attacks by moving your shields. Watch out for your own projectiles: Your shields will be destroyed when being hit by them.

This is a a re-release of a game made in 2013 for Ludum Dare 26. The theme of the game jam was Minimalism. The game was visually inspired by Stanley Kubrick’s 2001 – A Space Odyssey.
